June 26, 2022
Gargantua
Okay for only 25 points, but I've never been fond of Stealthy figures with no Range, no move and attack powers, and no support powers. You usually end up having to leave the protection of Stealth or wait for your opponent to come to them. And there's generally very little motivation for your opponent to come to them.
